Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute near Halsted/47th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses temp. rerouted NB: Halsted, 47th, LaSalle, Pershing, Halsted; SB: Halsted, Pershing, Wentworth, 47th, Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Halsted/47th, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Halsted, 47th, LaSalle, Pershing, then resume their normal route on Halsted.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, Pershing, Wentworth, 47th, then resume their normal route Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.
